entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
